description: Create a public praise culture value
permissions: Allowed if the user is permitted to create the related public praise (delegated to PublicPraisePolicy#create?, which allows managers/admins or the user who gave the praise).
side_effects: Creates a public praise culture value link between a public praise and a culture value.
validation_notes: --public-praise and --culture-value are required. The public praise and culture value must belong to the same organization.
